thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sichuan Languang Development Sees 2017 Net Profit Up 40-60 Pct Y/Y

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sichuan Languang Development Sees 2017 Net Profit Up 40-60 Pct Y/Y

organizations.name: reuters) - sichuan languang development co ltd

text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Sichuan Languang Development Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT EXPECTS 2017 NET PROFIT TO RISE 40-60 PERCENT Y/Y TO 1.25-1.43 BILLION YUAN ($192.44-$220.15 million)
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO RESUME ON JAN 9 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2D6xHsQ ; bit.ly/2D6NQi1 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.4956 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
